title: Loot System is bugged (Riot giving away GG MF?)
body:
TL;DR - Me and 2 of my friends all got GG MF today off the loot system (my friends off a lion orb and me off a Hextech Chest and Key). Someone we all got GG MF. What makes it weirder, it didn't give me a skin shard - it just permanently unlocked the skin for me.

This happen to anyone else?

Ironically enough, after being incredibly vocal on the NA forums about how the skin wasn't worth Ultimate-tier skin cost, I got it for free.

replies.body:
U guys got lucky. I also got it but from a hextech chest 2 months ago. 

It would've been a coincidence man, my friend got spirit guard udyr from his orb. It's just random and u all got lucky :)
tbh I think the orbs & chests during this event are just being incredibly generous. I got Dreadnova Darius out of a Lion Orb this morning.
Lol na, I got trash skins from mine. You guys got lucky af

Ultimate (and Mythic) skins are automatically made permanent skins shards, as per a relatively recent update to how Hextech crafting works, so there's no bug here.

Source: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233 (Hextech Crafting Guide)
Still doesn't explain how me and 2 of my friends all got GG MF on the same day. Maybe it's just a huge coincidence, but it's one HELL of a coincidence.
